main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified lights reported over Camp Hood, Texas between March 15 and March 19, 1949.
interesting points: Four unidentified lights were observed, consisting of three yellow and one red light,Two patrols from Killeen Base reported seeing these lights without identifying their source,Investigation by military personnel failed to reveal any cause for the lights,Another yellow light was reported seen in the vicinity by just one observer,The sightings had no accompanying noises or discernible movements.
